hanzi-su-wiki:
村

Значения

Деревня; село

Мнемоника

  • Деревня, где охраняют 寸 деревья 木 или имеются деревянные дома.

  • Там за деревом — деревня.

Варианты

邨

rtega_mnemonic:
村村RS
X		village
  • while traveling in a wooded area one sees trees 木 chopped off short 寸, one knows that there must be a village nearby
 甫 郷 里; 夬 字

村村RSvillage, town, hamlet, uncouth, vulgar
  • small 寸 town usually surrounded by trees 木; the inhabitants are sometimes uncouth or vulgar
 甫 郷 里; 夬 字
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 寸 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
农村 [ nóng cūn ]: rural area; village; Classifiers: 个
村民 [ cūn mín ]: villager
乡村 [ xiāng cūn ]: rustic; village; countryside
村庄 [ cūn zhuāng ]: village; hamlet; Classifiers: 座
山村 [ shān cūn ]: mountain village
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 寸 [ cùn ] inch; small, tiny
heisig_chinese_memo: Take a measurement to see how much wood you need to build the village.
heisig_story: The character for village was associated with rice fields (Frame 96). That for town, a step up on the evolutionary path to cities, shows a circle of trees glued together to measure off the confines of a town.
myStory:
для деревни достаточно одного рисового поля

город растет сам, нет поля, все близко друг к другу
koohiiStory1: If you´ve ever played an old 8 bit or 16 bit RPG, like Dragon Warrior or Final Fantasy or Inindou, you´ll remember that every town was all bordered off by a line of trees with no space in between to get out through. Imagine that the trees were glued together so you could only exit town through the main or side gates, (so you couldn´t escape the important scripted scenes.).
koohiiStory2: Pfft. At it´s core, a town is just a bunch of wood glued together. Edit - Stop starring this piece of crap story! xD.
jp_example_words:
漁村(ぎょそん): fishing village
農村(のうそん): agricultural community, farm village, rural
村(むら): village
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Someone’s taking measurements of the trees… Why is someone taking measurements of trees? These people are planning to take the trees and cut them down to make their village.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: There is a whole group of people out there who are measuring these trees. Imagine them asking each other “do you think this will be a good tree for our village center?” and other people nodding in agreement or disagreement as they measure.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: They take all the wood back to where they're building their village and once they construct the village center they paint a mural (むら) on the side of it. The mural is of the forest where they got the tree from so they remember the building's origins.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Look at the mural on the side of this newly constructed village center. So many trees! Visualize the whole process as the tree becomes a building as you gaze and reflect on the message of the mural.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: an inch (寸) from the trees (木) is the village
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Take a measurement to see how much wood you need to build the village.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " wood " and " inch ", the original meaning is village. Jin Taoqian "Peach Blossom Spring": "I heard that there is such a person in the village, and come to ask questions."

" Village " can mean vulgarity. Song Yang Wanli, "Song Yang Wanli, "Make flowers after a nap in the mountain": "Dip a basin of lotus water, and in the future will wash the face and root the teeth, cool the temples and grow the cheeks, but the deep musk is a village."

" Village " can also be described as simple. Yuan Zhang Yu "Ancient Village is Cao Di's Fu": "Wei Kingdom has descendants from the south, and the character of the ancient village is still present."

"The village " also expressed stupidity. "Qingpingshantang Script-Kuaizui Li Cuilian": "The child was born lonely and married to an ignorant village husband."

" Village " also said bad. Song Su Shi, "Answer Wang Gong": "It is a family man who lives and has species, and he spends a lot of money. Even when he comes to the car, he can't drink outside wine."

The " village " also expressed viciousness. "Zhu Ziyu Lei" Volume Four: "There are village magistrates, who insist on restraining themselves and need to accept them."

" Village " can also mean ridicule. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 63: "Xiren smiled and said: "You are a person, if you don't suffer from him two hard words a day, you can't get through.""
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " wood " and " inch ", the original meaning is village.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「寸」聲，本義為村莊。晉陶潛〈桃花源記〉：「村中聞有此人，咸來問訊。」

　　「村」可表示粗俗。宋楊萬里〈山居午睡起弄花〉：「浸得荷花水一盆，將來洗面漱牙根，涼生鬚鬢香生頰，沉麝龍涎卻是村。」

　　「村」還可形容樸實。元張昱〈古村為曹迪賦〉：「魏國南來有子孫，至今人物古而村。」

　　「村」也表示愚蠢。《清平山堂話本‧快嘴李翠蓮記》：「孩兒生得命裏孤，嫁了無知村丈夫。」

　　「村」亦表示惡劣。宋蘇軾〈答王鞏〉：「是家豪逸生有種，千金一擲頗黎盆。連車載酒來，不飲外酒嫌其村。」

　　「村」還表示凶狠。《朱子語類》卷四：「有那村知縣，硬自捉縛，須要他納。」

　　「村」也可表示奚落。《紅樓夢》第63回：「襲人笑道：『你這個人，一天不捱他兩句硬話村你，你再過不去。』」

村字的基本解释

村
cūn
乡下聚居的处所：村子。村塾（旧时农村中的私塾）。村民。
粗野：村野。村俗。村话。村气。

村字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cūn］
［《廣韻》此尊切，平魂，清。］
亦作“邨1”。
(1)村庄。
(2)乡下，农村。
(3)农村基层组织。
(4)指农村基层行政单位。某些地方相当于乡区。
(5)朴实。
(6)蠢，笨。
(7)粗俗。
(8)粗劣；恶劣。
(9)狠，凶。
(10)忙，急。
(11)讥诮，奚落。

村字的英文翻译

◎ 村
hamlet, village, rustic

村字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　村； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页511第17
【唐韻】此尊切【集韻】麤尊切【正韻】倉尊切，?寸平聲。【廣韻】墅也。【增韻】聚落也。字从邑从屯。經史無村字，俗通用。【晉·陶潛·歸田園詩】曖曖遠人村。【桃花源記】村中聞有此人，咸來問訊。

村字的源字形

村字的起名意思

：指乡下聚居的处所；也指朴实憨厚，如淳朴。

village
Basic explanation of words
village
cūn
Place where the country lives: the village. Village school (the old private school in the countryside). Villagers.
Rough: Murano. Village customs. Village dialect. Village spirit.
village
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cūn］
["Guangyun" This respect is cut, calm and clear. ]
Also known as "Village 1".
(1) The village.
(2) Countryside, rural area.
(3) Rural grassroots organizations.
(4) Refers to rural basic-level administrative units. Some places are equivalent to rural areas.
(5) Simple.
(6) Stupid, stupid.
(7) Vulgar.
(8) Poor; bad.
(9) Ruthless and fierce.
(10) Busy, urgent.
(11) Ridicule, ridicule.

village
Name meaning
: Refers to the place where people live in the countryside; also refers to the simplicity and honesty, such as simplicity.
形声字。篆书邑表意,其形像居住地和人,表示人聚居的地方;屯(tin)表声,兼表屯聚。隶、楷书从木(表示村庄多树
木),寸(can)声。本义是村庄。
①村庄;泛指人口聚居的地方:~落|乡~|新~。2粗
俗;土气:~野|~俗」~气。
~夫 ~姑 ~民 ~塾 ~学 ~医 ~寨 ~长
~镇 ~庄 ~子 ~夫俗子 邻一~ 农~ 山~
村
cũn
12
村村
。
OAr
Пиктофонетические символы.
Город тюленей выражает его значение, а его изображение напоминает место жительства и человека, указывая место, где люди живут вместе; тун (олов) выражает звук, а также выражает собирание тун.
Ли и обычное письмо Конгму (указывающее на то, что в деревне много деревьев), звук дюйма (кан).
Первоначальное значение - деревня.
①Деревня; обычно относится к месту, где проживает большое количество людей: ~ Луо | Сян ~ | Новый ~.
2 Вульгарный; деревенский: ~ дикий | ~ вульгарный ~ ци.
~ Муж ~ Тетя ~ Мин ~ Школа ~ Учеба ~ Медицинский ~ Чжай ~ Чанг ~ Чжуан ~ Чжуан ~ Цзы ~ Фусузи, Нунъи ~ Нун ~ Шан ~
деревня
cũn
12
Деревня
cūn
I сущ.
деревня, село, поселение, населённый пункт; сельский; деревенский
住在一个村里 жить в одной деревне
村学堂 деревенская (сельская) школа
村装 деревенское платье; по-деревенски одетый
II прил.
1) грубый; простой, неотёсанный; вульгарный
语言不村 речь не простая (достаточно изысканная)
村性格劣心苗 огрубелый и чёрствый (о характере)
2) свирепый, злой
他实是村 он действительно свиреп
III гл.
стыдить; бранить, выговаривать
村了他几句 несколькими словами смутить его (отругать)

царит окунь.»

村

Значения

Деревня; село

Мнемоника

  • Деревня, где охраняют 寸 деревья 木 или имеются деревянные дома.

  • Там за деревом — деревня.

Варианты

邨

Radicals: 木, 寸  (tree, measurement)
Meaning Mnemonic
Someone’s taking measurements of the trees… Why is someone taking measurements of trees? These people are planning to take the trees and cut them down to make their village.
There is a whole group of people out there who are measuring these trees. Imagine them asking each other “do you think this will be a good tree for our village center?” and other people nodding in agreement or disagreement as they measure.
Reading Mnemonic
They take all the wood back to where they're building their village and once they construct the village center they paint a mural (むら) on the side of it. The mural is of the forest where they got the tree from so they remember the building's origins.
Look at the mural on the side of this newly constructed village center. So many trees! Visualize the whole process as the tree becomes a building as you gaze and reflect on the message of the mural.
